name: End Of The Line (Fenris)
description:
End of the line prototype, where we show off the main location of the game, a moving train through hell. You can try the game's shooting mechanic, take a look at some of our animations and give us some feedback about the feeling invoked by being inside the room.
Please give use some feedback in the link below :
https://forms.gle/8QbcazVXasLm5f1GA
